mapper.insert: insert into inject_tv_albuminfo(seriesCode,channel,zxPriority,hwPriority) SELECT a.seriesCode,a.Channel,1,1 from vod_tv_albuminfo a where not EXISTS (SELECT 1 from inject_tv_albuminfo b where a.seriesCode=b.seriesCode) and a.seriesCode is not null

insert into inject_tv_albuminfovideo(seriesCode,drama,zxPriority,hwPriority) SELECT a.seriesCode,a.drama,1,1 from vod_tv_albuminfovideo a where not EXISTS (SELECT 1 from inject_tv_albuminfovideo b where a.seriesCode=b.seriesCode and a.drama=b.drama) and a.seriesCode is not null and a.drama is not null
mapper.update: update inject_tv_albuminfo t join inject_tv_priority b on b.channelCode=t.channel set t.zxPriority=b.priority,t.hwPriority=b.priority where t.zxInjectState=0 or t.hwInjectState=0
update inject_tv_albuminfovideo t join inject_tv_albuminfo b on b.seriesCode=t.seriesCode set t.zxPriority=b.zxPriority,t.hwPriority=b.hwPriority where t.zxInjectState=0 or t.hwInjectState=0

update inject_tv_albuminfovideo t set t.zxPriority=2,t.hwPriority=2 where t.seriesCode in( select b.seriesCode from inject_tv_albuminfo b where ifnull(b.zxInjectState,0)!=0 or ifnull(b.hwInjectState,0)!=0 )

update inject_tv_albuminfo tt join (select t1.seriesCode, if(t1.totalNum=t1.zxSuccessNum,1,if(t1.totalNum=t1.zxFailNum,0,2)) zxIsSuccess, if(t1.totalNum=t1.hwSuccessNum,1,if(t1.totalNum=t1.hwFailNum,0,2)) hwIsSuccess from ( SELECT b.seriesCode, count(1) totalNum, sum(b.zxInjectState=1) zxSuccessNum, sum(b.zxInjectState=0) zxFailNum, sum(b.hwInjectState=1) hwSuccessNum, sum(b.hwInjectState=0) hwFailNum from inject_tv_albuminfovideo b group by b.seriesCode ) t1 ) t2 on t2.seriesCode=tt.seriesCode set tt.zxInjectState=t2.zxIsSuccess,tt.hwInjectState=t2.hwIsSuccess
mapper.select: select count(1) from inject_tv_albuminfovideo a left join vod_tv_albuminfovideo b on a.seriesCode=b.seriesCode and a.drama=b.drama where a.zxInjectState=0 or a.hwInjectState=0
